TEXT.TITLE: COOPER CANADA SAID IT RECEIVED TAKEOVER OFFERS
TEXT.BODY: <Cooper Canada Ltd> said it has received takeover offers from "a number of companies." The company also said that "discussions are continuing, but no definitive arrangements have been made." It gave no further details. Reuter
